entries.description: Software Engineer (Jul 2021 - Nov 2023): Working with Reposit Power I have got to show my strengths working across a variety of areas. My strongest of these would be working with infrastructure in GCP and following this working as a Developer with Python as the core programming language. I have worked across these areas and technology stacks: DevOps - Google Cloud Platform, Terraform, Salt, gcloud, gsutil; SRE - Prometheus.io, Zabbix, PagerDuty; Developer - Python, Tox, Poetry, Django, Flask; Version Control - Git and GitHub; CI/CD - Jenkins; Across Roles - GKE (Google Kubernetes Engine), Docker
Financial Advisory Services - Synergy's Financial Advisory Services team assists Government entities meet their obligations under the Commonwealth Resource Management Framework.

entries.company: Australian Government Department of Human Services
entries.role: Various roles from Customer Service to Assistant Director
entries.description: Assistant Director - Costing Team (Aug 2013 - Mar 2015): Part of a team that completes costings for the Department of Human Services. These costings are a significant factor in the level funding available to the department and often become aggregated into the Federal Budget. Assistant Director - External Estimates (Aug 2012 - Aug 2013): Complete estimate related processes as set out in Estimates Memorandums. Assistant Accountant (Jan 2012 - Aug 2012): Monthly Reconciliations, various ledger integrity related tasks. Budget Officer (Mar 2011 - Jan 2012): Update Central Budget Management System (CBMS) through adjustments. Customer Service Officer (Feb 2009 - Mar 2011): Various roles including Team Leader, Self Service Champion, ICT Helpdesk, Customer Service Advisor.

Developing and using soft skills along with technical skills in my workplace is a high priority. Studying for the CPA designation keeps me focused on this and allows me to formally study the skills I utilize in the workplace.
Business Process Management (HD), Management Accounting (HD), Accounting Theory (HD), Financial Reporting (D)
University Games 2008 Team Captain & Manager, 3rd place under 81kg division Judo, 1st place male team judo
